item.title: Luigi Mangione won’t face death penalty in case of UnitedHealthcare CEO’s killing
item.description: Luigi Mangione will not face the death penalty on charges of stalking and killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in late 2024, a federal judge ru...

item.title: Russia reveals Ukraine energy ceasefire pushed by Trump is nearly over
item.description: Trump asked Putin to hold off hitting power facilities in Kyiv and other towns, but the Kremlin says the pause on strikes expires Sunday.

item.title: Don Lemon arrested by federal officials in connection with church protest
item.description: Former CNN host Don Lemon was arrested by federal officials and charged in connection with a church protest in Minneapolis that he had covered.

item.title: Trump sues IRS and Treasury for $10 billion over leaked tax records
item.description: The case means Trump has again filed a claim for a large amount of money against the government he oversees, putting him on both sides of the potentia...

item.title: Trump says U.S. will decertify Canadian-made planes, threatens 50% tariff
